content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were having a sleep over and we were up late when we noticed purple and blue lights above the clouds. we kept watching giving that we have never seen lights like that before and then the clouds opened up in a circle form and a craft emerged with red and blue lights and clear lights underneath. it made a circle manover and after it stopped 3 smaller craft came out from the same location above the clouds and they seemed to be evenly spaced around the large craft almost like a triangle shape. they all hovered for a few minutes and the larger craft beamed a white solid light to the ground and started moving around as did the smaller craft but without a beam. seemed like they were searching for something. my friend and i never stopped watching as we both were in shock nor seen anything like this before. after id say, about 3-4 minutes the 3 smaller objects went back inside the clouds where the opening and lights were the bigger one hovered and looked like red laser beams that made a solid line in the air and kept shape. the line did not fade but yet made almost like a box shape. once it made the box shape the craft shot something out of it threw the laser shaped box and landed behind our old house. after seeing all this my friend and i were very scared and didnt get much sleep if any that i remember. being scared as we were and giving what we seen we never really looked for the object. i did however see an episode on tv about a person finding and seeing about the same thing i seen that night. but what he found had traces of metals that we dont know of even today. i myself know the area where it landed and know, even today that the land did not change since the sighting that its still there in the ground and i want to find it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Clouds opened, 4 crafts came from clouds, beam, searching, object shot never looked for

content.detailedDescription: It was a stormy day, windy, thunderstorms off and on. while outside my in-laws smoking in depford nj. i saw what i thought was a black balloon. it was traveling west from the jersey coast, against the wind. it then started to travel northwest. when it stopped i would say it was approx. at the ben franklin bridge on the jersey side. the object was between layers of clouds. the upper layer was blowing west, while the lower layer was blowing nne. this object stayed in the same spot for 45 min. it then moved slowly sse back toward the jersey coast another 15 min. until i finally lost sight of it behind the houses. did anyone ever see anything like this before? my wife and kids saw this and blew it off. this has been on my mind and i can't stop thinking about it. the family i told all broke my stones. i want to find out more about this. can anyone help me figure this out?
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black object travel west, northwest, hover then traveled southeast. 1 hour total duration.

content.detailedDescription:
While watching a football game on tv i decided to set up a video camera outside on a tripod. i pointed the camera in a southernly direction, set the lens a 2x power and let the camera run for approximately 20-minutes. a day or two later i decided to view the film on a vcr and while running the film at half speed i discovered that i had taped numerous objects during that 20-minutes and have continued to do so ever since into the late 2000's. the majority of craft are either somewhat arrow shaped but i have videotaped saucer and skate board type objects all of which have very good to excellant definition. some of which were shown on the history channels 'ufo hunters'. if anyone wants to see them i can either send them to ufo stalker or e-mail them upon request. i am enclosing three video stills that might be of interest to ufo stalker viewers 

note: all the videos were filmed in the village of oak creek, sedona arizona
content.summary: There were a number of craft of varied designs that i videotaped. i am jepgs of a couple of the crafts that were taken from the tape

content.detailedDescription: This event occured back in early 90's while i was still 15-16. i was walking across the apartment complex from my place to my girlfriends about 1 am. i dont know what made me look but when i looked back towards my apartment building i noticed 3 triangular lights moving very slowly and quietly moving towards local busniess called tecumseh stamping ( i think that was its name).I stood there for what seemed like an hour just watching it. i could make out a silouette that the craft was triangular on the base with 3 triangular lights at each of the peaks of the shape. i could also see sillouette with the factory lights in the skyline that the craft also had a pyrimid shape on top but not straight, more of a flattened and slanted pyrimid, its hard to describe in words but i can see it as if i just saw it last night. i will include my best rendering of it as i can, i'm not the best artist but i can still pitcure it in my head any time. i saw no lights on it other then those i could see on the bottom. my first thought when i think about this craft is maybe was some kinda stealth fighter like the b2 bomber or something but the slowness and silentness of it make me think otherwise. i dont claim this to be alien but judging from what tech we as humans have and are experimenting with i dont think it was man made.
content.summary: Triangular aircraft flying over apartments towards tecumseh stamping

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my living room window where i had my last sighting of a different form of ufo back in july of 2011. when i first spotted it, i thought it could've been the planet mars - due to its bright red color. that's when i noticed it was moving very slow from left to right across the sky. and this is over the brightly lit city of new castle. it was a starlike orb that twinkled and pulsed. it was the slowest thing i've ever seen, and i've seen many possible ufos. i lost sight of it after leaving to do something. when i'd returned the orb was nowhere to be seen. i had only left for no less than 5-10 minutes. perhaps, it was the planet mars, but i'm sure mars doesn't move like this orb did.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Red orb slowly crossed the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the outside back patio enjoying my morning coffee and the cold crisp air and looking out at the old mining town of jerome on mingus mountain towards the west when i spotted a single white cloud, about the size of a golfball at arms length, and the cloud was moving in my direction towards the east at an unhurried rate of speed. what struck me as odd was the fact that there were no other clouds in the sky at all as far as the eye could see. the cloud was also bright white, almost luminous as though shining from the inside from some unknown source. i continued to watch this cloud coming closer and i stood up to walk to the back wall so the patio roof would not obscure my view never taking my eyes off the cloud when it suddenly stopped moving. i remember thinking inside my head "a ha - gotcha ! because at that point as far as i was concerned this was no longer a stray cloud but a ufo that was cloaked in a vapor/cloud cover to conceal itself. no sooner had i thought this and the 'cloud/ufo reversed it's course and started to ascend in altitude a bit, it stopped and hovered again and then resumed it's original course heading to the east crossing over the top of the house. my friend came outside and wondered what i was looking at and i explained what i was seeing and she just rolled her eyes and went back inside to watch the idiot box. the entire event lasted about 4 minutes or so and it struck me as funny that the ufo/cloud panicked and reversed course once i realized what it was and than just continued on course as though to let me know that i can't prove anything other than telling about my experience here on mufon for others to read. i have had several dozen sightings of ufo's here in arizona over the last 4 years of different types of crafts like diamond shaped, golden bell shaped, disc and star-like as well. i know that they can 'hear' my thoughts because they almost always react to me saying in my head " i see you !" and they will either brighten up if i ask them to or quickly and instantly disappear before my eyes which is kind of spooky. we are not alone and i for one look forward to the day when they allow themselves to be known to us other than just lights or crafts in the sky that we can't touch. keep looking skyward and hopefully you too will see what so many of us on the planet have witnessed. it's pretty awe inspiring to me to know that we are not alone in this wonderful universe.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small singular cloud in a clear blue sky that was moving, stopped, reversed, then started moving again.

content.detailedDescription: My fiance, my cousin & myself were driving through pennsylvania for a couple hours enjoying the tranquility of the scenery & conversing about life when we made a wrong turn & ended up on doe run rd. we were driving on a downward slope passing the hillside when i noticed off to my right that there were lights behind the treeline. at first i thought it was just lights from a house we were approaching but as we got closer the lights ascended up through the treeline & hovered just a few feet above the treeline about 200-300ft away from the road. the object was noticeably big considering it was about the size of the first floor of the house we had just passed. i opened my car window & had literally half of my body outside of the car as we were moving because i at first thought this can't be what i think it is. the object had no sound what so ever & the lights were the purest white i had ever seen & didn't light up the trees at all. it was a disc shape with three white lights on the bottom, i assumed it was the front of the object because i got the feeling that something in the craft was watching me from inside, & then the object tilted at about a 45 degree angle looking directly at me & i began to feel strange. it was emitting an energy that i had never felt before & i could feel the energy coursing through my body. this was not fear or an adrenaline rush. it was something different i was experiencing. i could hear my fiance in the background yelling "what is that?, what the hell is that?" i could hear the fear in his voice. it was so close to us. i couldn't take my eyes off of it, not even for just a second so that i could grab my camera. almost as if i was in a trance. as more cars began to catch up to our car (we were driving very slow since we were unfamiliar with the area we were in)& we began to pass the object it seemed to go into what i would describe as a decoy mode. the three main lights shut off & they switched on four much smaller lights. two red(diagonal from one another) & parallel to the red lights were two green lights(also diagonal from one another). i broke out of the trance as we passed it, & i started to yell out in excitement "turn your lights back on!, please! turn them back on." i guess i had hoped that they would listen to me. i then yelled out "i knew you were real!, i'm so happy that i could see you even if this is the only time." it was so amazing. i kept watching out the window as we got farther & farther away from it & it stayed there until we were about a mile away from it. it then began to ascend into the sky & i lost sight of it. my cousin was in the backseat in complete shock. he remained quiet the entire time & just watched. he wasn't sure what to make of the object we were seeing. he was a skeptic prior to this experience & it took him a few weeks to admit what he saw. my fiance & i had discussed the encounter frequently after that & to this day still talk about it.
content.summary: Object rose up over the tree line & hovered for 15 mins, appeared to see me, tilted in my direction.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night march 24,2012 at 11:52pm i took my dog out to do his business and i noticed right over my tree in burbank wa. and at about the same hight as small air plain would fly was a 8'-10' glass ball with what looked like a ark welder in it but it was putting off orange-red light instead of white. it was traveling east 100 degees at about 20-30 miles an hour. too slow for an air plane unless it was an ultralite but this ball put off so much light that it would have illuminated any craft around it. i knew no one would believe me without evidence so i ran back into the house and grabbed my video camera and got 5 min. of video of it going away from me until it went out of sight. it's an analog hi-8 and i have been trying to find someone that can put it on a dvd so i can upload it on the internet. i have talked to our air port and they said that they would not have record of radar because they shut down at 10:00pm. a few days later doing the same thing with the dog i saw a white orb come out of burbank hights arleens addition across the river towards finley wa. it was traveling very low and like a rocket. i haven't seen anything move that fast. it moved so fast i didn't even have time to turn on the camea i was holding. the object that i did get video of was right over me and it was putting out so much light that it actually would hurt your eyes if you stared at it to long. i had my camera in night vision mode so that it would film it at night so it looks white-green on film but it was really orange-red and maybe a hint of yellow. i didn't have time to grab my tripod so it's a bit shaky. i ran over to my fence and tried to stabilize the camera but it still moves around on the screen.
content.summary: It looked like a 8'-10' glass ball with an ark welder in it putting out orange-red light. i got 5 min of video.

content.detailedDescription: About 6 lights in a triangle shape evenly spaced.  appeared to be one craft. hovered about 200 feet off the ground, hovered over local farm field above hwy 164 and skyline ave for approximately 3 minutes with extremely quiet jet engine sound. no rotor thump of that of a helicopter. i drove under it and it slowly flew away at about 30 mph, with no engine increase in sound. clear night sky but i could not get a clear visual of the craft. i wouldn���t say its alien craft but i���ve never heard or seen anything like it before.
content.summary: 6 light triangle hovering with very faint jet engine sound, not a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife called me out to the front porch that faces a clear texas northern
sky and there it was past 2 tv/radio antenna towers beyond there location. blueish/whitesh like new hid car headlights, but not always visible on our view side and then bam!!! it made a turn or a climb, we saw the light and then it went off and the object was across the horizon showing light again. lasted a couple of minutes and then gone.  the last performance was a drop with a tracer light and then an immediated climb and then gone...
everything i have ever heard on coast to coast am leads me to believe we saw our first ufo. it moved so fast it had to be..

2 kewl...

really sorry, no video or pics, i didn't want to miss anything;(
content.summary: Saw blueish white hid type lights zig zag patterns way fast

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was going to have fun looking through binoculars
so i looked through my window and saw it . at first i thought it was a plane.  then i looked closer that's when i realized it wasn't. i felt uncomfortable at first then i felt fine. i lost sight by looking away.
content.summary: Looking outside with binoculars

content.detailedDescription:
I just moved to a rural area in southwestern pa for a job after living in rural northwestern pa (and never seeing anything like this).
i was in my apartment on my laptop when i heard what sounded like a plane flying low and close. i went to my door and opened it to see what was happening, and i saw a kite-shaped object flying east over town. it looked familiar (most likely from tv programs about ufos) but certainly not like an airplane, so i was not alarmed, but i was extremely curious and interested while watching it. the sun had set but the sky was still royal blue, so i could clearly see the gray shape of the object and could tell that it had no discernible wings, just a solid diamond-like shape. there were several lights along the front, and i believe the ones at the corners flashed. some were white and others were slightly yellowish. as the object neared the hills that would block it from my view, it turned slightly to the north (left). it flew slowly and smoothly, and sounded much louder than a plane. the whooshing hum was higher in pitch than any plane or jet i've heard before.
i live south of an airport, and i've observed several airplanes flying tonight after seeing this object. they all go north and have lights in a plane-like configuration. the kite-shaped object was lower, louder, and definitely not flying toward the airport.
after seeing it, i returned to my laptop and researched what i may have seen, and found ufo sightings very similar to mine. i'm a smart and logical person, and i am 100% sure i did not see an airplane. i will now keep my camera close and try to get evidence if this happens again.
content.summary: Loud jet-like noise heard, then observed lighted diamond-shaped object flying slowly east

content.detailedDescription: I was on the farm when i saw the object.  it came and within a minute my cows were gone.
content.summary: Triangle shaped glowing object hovering in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing inside a store lobby while on the phone at work.  a bright shine hit my eye unexpectedly. i quickly noticed that it was not from a car and when i looked up there was a metallic disk in the air rotating and tilting as it was slowly moving upwards in a spiral type path.  i was able to clearly see the shape and surface of this craft.  it was a perfect metallic disk with no seams, lights, glass, or doors of any kind.  it was made of a very reflective silver type metal.  as it continued to move it suddenly stopped and vibrated.  at this time i was still seeing the metal shine from the sun hitting it.  it sat vibrating and tilting before suddenly moving in a  horizontal direction approximately 40 feet.  the speed it moved was extremely fast and almost instantaneous. it hovered again shaking with a strange pulsing motion before moving a small distance again horizontally. i was on the phone with a co-worker and i was trying to describe what i was seeing while in complete shock and amazement at what was going on.  after hovering for a couple seconds it disappeared  into thin air.  it seemed to vanish from the outside of the craft inwards at a very fast rate.  it did not fly away.

this whole event took approximately 27 seconds.  i had enough time to describe what i was seeing to someone on the phone and get a very good look at this object.  it was about 700 feet from me and roughly 50 feet off the ground.  the size of this disc was about 16 feet wide by 6 feet at its thickest middle point.  there is no doubt in my mind that this was a very solid disk and was made of a extremely reflective metal type material.  the shine coming off the craft was striking and can be compared to a bright shine off a chrome part of a car in the sun.  that shine hit me in the eye twice which made this experience very real and disturbing.  i have seen multiple ufos in my life but nothing this clear or close.  i will now keep a high definition camera handy because i would not believe this unless i had seen it.  this is reality and i wish there were answers.
content.summary: Metallic disk spins and moves in various directions before vanishing.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen strange lights in the sky since 1998.  it was really late one night while living on the eastside of detroit,during a drive with a family member.  i noticed a red dot in the sky.  being a persistent stargazer i watched it and noticed that it probably wasn't a natural phenonmenon. the dot was hovering initially and i told my cousin to look at it.  it started to move westbound, and we followed it for about 2 miles.  the red dot split into 3 red dots they then moved along for awhile.  then they returned to a single red dot and flew off fast.

there are lights in the sky alot in detroit especially around the city airport on the eastside.  the lights are usually stationary, glowing a faint red, blue light, that seems to fluctuate in intensity.  i've seen as many as 6 out at a time.  several family members have also noticed the strange lights near city airport.  i tried to record on my ancient camcorder and the lights are too faint for me to see.  the last time i saw the lights near the airport would've been around june 2011.
content.summary: Ufo sightings

content.detailedDescription:
Just around 11:30pm, we switched off the bedroom lights. our top windows are not covered, so we have a view of the night sky.

looking out the window, i saw a single light quickly move across the sky, in an arc. initially assumed this was either a residual image in my eye or a plane/helicopter, but the same pattern of movement was observed several times so i asked my wife to confirm. she also saw the light.

we moved the blins to one side on the lower window and observed 4 lights moving very quickly (much quicker than a plane passing overhead) from a central point, out in 4 directions, and then coming back to the central point (no light in the central point, appeared to be the four lights created the central point when converged).

this happened maybe 4 or 5 times, then the lights were gone. both my wife and i witnessed this event.

i watched the sky for another 20 minutes or so and saw nothing else.

whatever these were, they moved very fast. i can't think of how best to describe it. the force of the movements and elipsical route taken to reconverge on the same point must have been incredible. this movement was not in any way similar to a plane or helicopter movement.

any explanantion/confirmation/additional sightings much appreciated.
content.summary: Incredibly fast lights over pelham, westchester

content.detailedDescription: Driving home after picking up my sister from ucsd. going south of the 15 freeway. about 5-10 minutes getting on that freeway noticed a white glow object the glow was not wavering. observed the object until we got home. while observing the object noticed 2-4 planes observing the object as well. it was amazing. lost sight of the object because of the tree line near our place.
content.summary: Ufo over rancho cucamonga
content.locationName: San Diego to Rancho Cucam, California

content.detailedDescription: Objec descended at less than 40 degree angle, from approximately 222degrees sw to 206degrees sw. some years ago i saw a space shuttle fly over. it was faster than that, but not as fast as a meteor. this can probably be explained, but it seemed odd to me. i was outside our barn, and just happened to look up and see it. i lost sight of it behind our house. it was a great distance away. i'm curious if anyone else saw it, and what an explanation could be.
content.summary: Too big, bright and slow for a meteor. too fast and bright for a plane, and only one light.

content.detailedDescription: Objec descended at less than 40 degree angle, from approximately 222degrees sw to 206degrees sw. some years ago i saw a space shuttle fly over. it was faster than that, but not as fast as a meteor. this can probably be explained, but it seemed odd to me. i was outside our barn, and just happened to look up and see it. i lost sight of it behind our house. it was a great distance away. i'm curious if anyone else saw it, and what an explanation could be.
content.summary: Too big, bright and slow for a meteor. too fast and bright for a plane, and only one light.

content.detailedDescription: For the past few nights, my family has all observed two objects in the western sky.  at first we thought they were just stars, but on the third night we observed flashing and brightening and dimming and color changes from white to red to green to blue and then reddish orange then back to white.  always in the same order.  so we began watching every night for the next 4 nights.  this evening ( march 28th) we once again observed the two objects.  one was always bigger than the other and the smaller one was always directly below the big one.  tonight that was not the case.  we saw both objects in the western sky but the smaller one was below and to the right of the larger one.  we observed the color change much more brilliantly and in the same pattern.  the smaller one kept moving in a inclined pattern and pulsating bright to dim to bright again.  the larger object seemed to do the same and had a wobbling up and down motion.  as it would brighten the smaller object would move away and then would move closer again when the big one dimmed.  we all felt amazed and a bit shocked by this sighting, but also a sense of wonder and calm.  myself i felt a sense of knowing it was watching us and reacting to our movements as well.  i am a true believer in scientific proof but also believe we are not alone in this universe. after we had watched for around 30 minutes the objects started to fade.  we noticed the littler one of the two began leaving a whitish/blue "tail" or streamer behind it as it slower drifter to the north and out of sight.  the larger object just sort of faded out of view as if it was leaving in a direct line with our sight.  it just kept getting farther and farther away until we could not see it anymore.  these sighting have occurred every night for the past 8 days except on day 4 but has returned every night since.  i will report again tomorrow if they show up again.  when they do it is always two objects.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 objects one large one small hovering and pulsing and leaving a light trail.

content.detailedDescription: Friday evening march 23rd, 2012 over south st. louis city appeared a beautiful double rainbow. it lasted for maybe 10 minutes, and i was able to get my camera and snap off about 30 pictures. in only one of them, "within" the rainbow, was a black "line" with a black "aura" around it in the purple section of the major rainbow! the pictures from six seconds before and twelve seconds later of essentially the same perspective did not exhibit such an anomaly, and so i know it was not a camera anomaly. i did not notice the object until i downloaded the images from camera to computer. a single cropped image at 100% of the camera's resolution accompanies this report. i find such interesting in comparison to a similar circumstance event on november 10th, 2010, also here at my st. louis south city house, also reported to mufon, i took pictures of a beautiful sunrise and in different images uaps were also later noticed to have been captured.
content.summary: Unknown aerial phenomenon captured during double rainbow over st. louis

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i in hot tub about 10 minutes to 9 at night ,clear sky, watching venus... we spotted dim triangle light outline traveling very fast south to north ..Very surprizing..Very fast moving....1/2 of the sky in 15 sec.
we were at home in vero beach fl....Planes are always in the air in vero
there was one right before we spotted the dim cheveron ,triangle,
 boomerang looking thing.Appeared to be huge and faster then the space shuttle by far, look you guys we dont care i'm just telling you... i quickly looked at the time aprox8:52pm 03-28-2012,checked the angle in the sky   45 deg. to the west. got out of hot tub to watch it as far as i could as it flew out of view to the north just then the light pattern 
seemed to flash bright but i couldnt swear to that because that could have been just the air at great distance....K ? call me if you want 7724106218  russell ....  thank you guys for all your hard work and patience.
content.summary: Two people viewed dim triangle outline of lights/south to north very fast very big

content.detailedDescription: Approximately 8:30 pm i was walking with my children.  it was a clear night and i looked up and saw something moving in a straight line not making a sound.  my children saw the object also.  my oldest with better eyes than mine described a rounded triangle with 8 to 10 white light on the bottom.  we guess it was around 5000 to 10000 feet.  i was not going to report it until i saw another post from someone in roanoke that same night stating he saw something very much the same.  when we saw the object it was moving in the direction of roanoke.  i am not a believer in visitors from other planets and assume it was some type of secret military craft.
content.summary: Rounded triangle shape with 8 to 10 lights on bottom.  flew directly overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my 13 month old daughter to a morning meeting with our stroller group.  we were driving north west on md 175 between fort meade and md 295 around 9:37 when i saw what i first thought was a low moving cloud.  it was in the sky ahead and visible above the trees as it crossed the highway ahead.  there was relatively no wind this morning, the trees were not blowing, nor did i observe any other swiftly moving clouds as one observes during blustery weather.  it was just this one "cloud" object and it was moving from left to right across my field of vision.  i had just enough time to register it visually, think, "what the heck is that?" when it disappeared behind the tree line to the right of the highway.  i never recovered a visual off it.  it was moving very swiftly and was almost the same color as the grey cloud cover.  i am claiming it was a ufo, because it was an "object" it was "flying" and i could not identify it.
content.summary: Appeared like a small cloud, well below the cloud cover, and moving swiftly despite no wind.

content.detailedDescription: To much to write about. if u could email me a phone number i will call with my report
content.summary: A dull round shaped planet like star in sky that was redish orange. one min there next gone and then 4 aircraft appear right away

content.detailedDescription: Star gazing for about 45 minutes starting about 7:45 pm.  i saw a meteor west to north, one southeast to northwest.  i saw a sattelite south to north and one southeast to northwest. i was focusing on big dipper and north star when 3 relatively dim lights appeared about directly overhead and went straight north and disappeared.  appeared very high up and uniform inseparation during flight.  they were about 2/3 the brightness of the north star.
content.summary: 3 lights meteor speed south to north 2/3 brightness of north star traveling together

content.detailedDescription:
at the time of my encounter i lived on a remote arm of the "lake of the ozarks" in "southern missouri", it was in may of 1970. i have kept the story of what i experienced to myself for fear of ridicule. only telling four other people until today, now i am ready to share my encounter with the everyone. over the years i have heard many a story of strange encounters', yet none of them described a craft like the one i saw.
  it was a saturday, around 10am when i decided to bank fish for crappie. so, i took off walking the rocky hillside shore, fishing as i walked. i did this often, and each time it took me "three to three and a half hours" round trip. 
i had fished to my turn around point and was about half way back home. i had looked to the sun to guess the time and it was above me in the noon position. just then my lure got caught on a branch, i turned to free the lure and noticed the most amazing thing i would ever see. there floating perfectly still was a "huge" craft, it made no sound, not so much as a whisper. i remember feeling a strange calmness, not frightened or excited as one might expect to feel. i stood there staring at it for what felt to be "three to five minutes". the first thing that i remember thinking was, why doesn't it fall, why doesn't it make any sound? the craft was triangular in shape, except the corners didn't come to a point, instead they appeared to be blunted. the craft was around 200 yards or so away from me, above the hill. it was a dull tan color (like sand color is), with a thick glossy black strip down the side of it. the surfaces appeared to be perfectly flat and smooth, i noticed no seems on it at all. the craft was about 100 yards plus in its width and length, and four to six stories in thickness.( i could only see the bottom, one blunt corner and one side of it from my point of view ) suddenly i noticed the craft had began to very slowly float away, over the hill moving out of sight. i stood there watching it, when suddenly i noticed that i was waving at the craft in a goodbye manner. i don't remember starting to wave, only that i was waving. as it passed out of sight the day light suddenly became very very dim all at once. i looked to see what had blocked the sun, but the sun wasn't above me any more. instead it was on the western horizon about to go down. i headed down the shore back home as fast as i could, it was dark when i arrived, it was after 8pm. a good seven hours of my life and memory are still missing from that encounter. a couple of days later i found two bright red dots' inside the hair line above my temple and located an odd bump on the back of my head toward the base of my skull.(they are both still there) it should have only taken me three or so hours to complete that trip, instead it had taken me over ten hours. 
   i am hoping to be regressed, and will make public any and all memories that i am able to recover from the encounter.
content.summary: Triangle,lite brown,glossy black stripe,silent,floating in mid air,150 yards length,four to six stories thick,seven hours time and memory missing.    h
